title: Vaccine Adverse Events Archives
cleaned_text: Story submitted by her parents Marie–Océane’s parents, Jean-Jacques and Yveline Bourguignon, granted permission for their daughter’s story to be published hoping they can help people realize there are potential risks involved with HPV vaccinations. They do not want anyone else to go through what they have experienced without knowing of the possibility in advance. Jean-Jacques […]

opengraph.title: Vaccine Adverse Events Archives - SaneVax, Inc.
opengraph.description: The definition of of an adverse event is any new medical condition appearing after vaccination. Should you experience a new medical condition after vaccination, the best policy is report it to your health authorities immediately. It is their responsibility to determine whether the new medical condition is related to the vaccine or not.
